brief: This is a Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) analyzer.

methods.name: analyze()
methods.desc: Calculates the current frequency spectrum and returns it as an array with as many elements as frequency bands.

methods.name: analyzeSample()
methods.desc: Calculates the frequency spectrum of the given sample, returning an array of magnitudes.

methods.name: input()
methods.desc: Define the audio input for the analyzer.

description:
This is a Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) analyzer. It calculates the normalized
 power spectrum of an audio stream the moment it is queried with the analyze()
 method.
name: FFT

parameters.name: bands
parameters.description:
number of frequency bands for the FFT as an integer (default 512).
            This parameter needs to be a power of 2 (e.g. 16, 32, 64, 128,
            ...).
